item.title: Constructum
item.description: Constructum is a custom-built CI/CD pipeline for my homelab. It runs on top of Kubernetes, given that my homelab is based around my Kubernetes cluster. Features Runs simple pipelines defined in internal Git repositories Has secret support to derive secrets from various secret stores Upcoming Features A user interface for easy access to logs / details A command-line tool for running pipelines locally and communicating with the API server Integration with the source-control tool I use Multiple pipelines per repository
